page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT
page.content: There are a number of small employers in the area but most have to travel from village to their jobs.{Duponts} warehouse employs 50 people, 18 manual and rest managerial and clerical.The{ {American Can}warehouse employs 6 workers plus 4 drivers.The complex also contains their 'Technical Centre' which employs 20 people including chief chemist, quality engineer and customer technical services officer.A decline in employment in{agriculture} was obvious to the interviewers.Most farms were run solely by owners family with casual labour recruited when necessary.Much greater use of machinery cause of this.Mrs Mounfield, Manor Farm said"At one time 8 Irish labourers would come over for potato picking and live in the shant"Now 3 people on potato harvester do all the work.50 employed by 2 Rd.haulage firms
